mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ageless.shoppingcart ( userId, productId, orderamount, skuid ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, #{orderamount}, #{skuid} );
mapper.select:
SELECT shoppingcart.id,shoppingcart.userId,shoppingcart.productId,shoppingcart.orderamount,sku.price
,productpic.picPath,product.productName,sku.SKUcon FROM shoppingcart
LEFT JOIN sku ON shoppingcart.productId=sku.productId
LEFT JOIN productpic ON shoppingcart.productId=productpic.tuid
LEFT JOIN product ON shoppingcart.productId=product.productId GROUP BY shoppingcart.id
ORDER BY shoppingcart.id DESC

SELECT shoppingcart.id,shoppingcart.userId,shoppingcart.productId,shoppingcart.orderamount,sku.price
,productpic.picPath,product.productName,sku.SKUcon FROM shoppingcart
LEFT JOIN sku ON shoppingcart.productId=sku.productId
LEFT JOIN productpic ON shoppingcart.productId=productpic.tuid
LEFT JOIN product ON shoppingcart.productId=product.productId WHERE shoppingcart.id = #{productId} GROUP BY shoppingcart.id
ORDER BY shoppingcart.id DESC
